name: docs
description: Command for building HTML and JSON documentation
helpText: Running the command with no options will rebuild JSONS for modified bundles.
If there is a modified bundle, then HTML will be rebuilt, unless --no-html is specified
Otherwise, jsons will be rebuilt for the following reasons:
1. json was missing from the jsons build folder

options.help: Force all files to be rebuilt
Specify which bundles to build JSONS for
